select report.*, h.name as hospitalName, hmr.create_time as visitDate from h_medical_report report left join m_hospital h on report.hospital_id = h.id left join h_medical_record hmr on hmr.id = report.medical_record_id
order by report.id desc
select * from h_medical_report mr where mr.student_id = #{studentId} order by mr.id desc limit 1

select * from h_medical_report report
order by report.id desc limit 1

select r.*, d.name as doctorName from h_medical_report r left join h_doctor d on d.id = r.doctor_id where r.student_id = #{studentId} and r.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} and date(r.create_time) = CURDATE() order by r.id desc limit 1
select r.* from h_medical_report r where r.student_id = #{studentId} and r.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} and date(r.create_time) = CURDATE() order by r.id desc limit 1

select report.id as reportId, report.hospital_id as hospitalId, report.create_time, report.update_time as updateTime, mh.name as hospitalName, report.student_id as studentId from h_medical_report report left join h_medical_record record on report.medical_record_id = record.id left join m_hospital mh on report.hospital_id = mh.id where report.student_id = #{studentId} order by report.create_time desc

select report.id as reportId, report.hospital_id as hospitalId, report.create_time, report.update_time as updateTime, mh.name as hospitalName, report.student_id as studentId, report.glasses_situation as glassesSituation, report.medical_content as medicalContent, report.doctor_id as doctorId from h_medical_report report left join h_medical_record record on report.medical_record_id = record.id left join m_hospital mh on report.hospital_id = mh.id where report.student_id = #{studentId} order by report.create_time desc
select * from h_medical_report where report_conclusion_data is null

select report.id as reportId, report.hospital_id as hospitalId, report.create_time, report.update_time as updateTime, mh.name as hospitalName, report.student_id as studentId, report.glasses_situation as glassesSituation, report.medical_content as medicalContent, report.doctor_id as doctorId, student.name as name, student.gender as gender, student.birthday as birthday, student.id as hospitalStudentId from h_medical_report report left join h_hospital_student student on student.student_id = report.student_id left join h_medical_record record on report.medical_record_id = record.id left join m_hospital mh on report.hospital_id = mh.id left join h_doctor doctor on doctor.id = report.doctor_id where report.hospital_id = #{requestDTO.hospitalId} and student.hospital_id = #{requestDTO.hospitalId} and student.status = 0
and student.name like CONCAT('%', #{requestDTO.name}, '%')
and doctor.name like CONCAT('%', #{requestDTO.doctorName}, '%')
and report.create_time between #{requestDTO.reportStartTime} and #{requestDTO.reportEndTIme}
order by report.create_time desc
